notes: Very modern, brand-new or recently renovated apartment with pristine white tile floors, clean white walls, wall-mounted AC units, and contemporary dark wood trim. Being on floor 5 of 18 in a newer high-rise strongly suggests elevator access. For baby safety, the polished tile floors could be slippery but there are no visible balconies, stairs, or sharp corners in these images; the unit appears very clean and safe overall.
